question: Iyo hatarimo indi myanya birabujijwe gutwara ku ntebe y'imbere y'imodoka abana  badafite imyaka:

options: Birabujijwe gusa ku binyabiziga bikora ubucuruzi kugenda bidasizemo intera  yerekanywe
Birabujijwe kuri bose kugenda badasizemo intera yerekanywe
Birabujiwe ibinyabiziga bifite ubutambike bungana cyangwa burenga metero 50

options: iyo bireba feri yo guhagarara umwanya munini ubwo kurekurana bikaba  bidashoboka bidakozwe n'umuyobozi
question: Nta mwanya n'umwe feri ifungiraho ushobora kurekurana n'ibiziga keretse:
Ahatari mu nsisiro umuvuduko ntarengwa wa velomoteri mu isaha ni:

options: gukomeza ugabanyije umuvuduko n'ubwitonzi kuko bishoboka ko abanyeshuli  bakwambuka bitunguranye
question: Igihe za otobisi zigenewe gutwara banyeshuli zihagaze kugirango zibafate cyangwa  bavemo ugomba :

options: Wegereye icyapa cyo guhagarara umwanya muto
question: Iki kimenyetso kiri mu muhanda kivuze iki ?

options: Iherezo ry'ibibuzwa byose mu karere ku binyabiziga bigenda

options: Ku musigiti ku rusengero ku rutambiro

options: Hafi y'isangano cyerekana isangano bagendamo bazengurutse

Ibinyabiziga bigenewe gutwara ibintu birengeje toni 3.5
question: Ibinyabiziga bikurikira bigomba gukorerwa isuzumwa  buri mwaka:

options: Guhindura icyerekezo ibumoso ugana aho bahagarara

question: Iki cyapa gisobanura iki?

Buri modoka cyangwa buri romoruki ikuruwe n'iyo modoka bishobora kugira itara  risa n'icyatsi kibisi bituma umuyobozi yerekana ko yabonye ikimenyetso cy'uwitegura  kumunyuraho. Iryo tara rigomba gushyirwa aha hakurikira:
Ahari hejuru cyane y'ubuso bumurika h'amatara ndangambere na ndanganyuma  ntihashobora kuba aharenze ibipimo bikurikira hejuru y'ubutaka iyo ikinyabiziga  kidapakiye:
Nta tara na rimwe cyangwa akagarurarumuri bishobora kuba bifunze ku buryo igice  cyabyo cyo hasi cyane kimurika kitaba kiri hasi y'ibipimo bikurikira kuva ku butaka  igihe ikinyabiziga kidapakiye :
Urwego B imodoka zagenewe gutwara ibintu kandi zifite uburemere ntarengwa  bwemewe bungana gute?

Kubyerekeye kwerekana ibinyabiziga n'ukumurika kwabyo ndetse no kwerekana  ihindura ry'ibyerekezo byabyo, birabujijwe gukora andi matara cyangwa utugarura  rumuri, uretse ibitegetswe, ariko ibyo ntibireba amatara akurikira
